item.description:
A bin bag has been dumped on the corner and food waste is spreading across the pavement

item.title: Household rubbish dumped on street, 12th October
item.description:
Between 89 and 121 rubbish consistently dumped on street and left for weeks, also place of worship opposite disposable coffee cups and cigarette butts thrown even though there are 4 very large bins there. Causes problems to community health as rats and fox

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ravensdale Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Mixed waste at this regular dumping site, 12th October
item.description:
Hackney commercial sacks but also other random household items next to the tree at junction of Westgate St and Mare St outside Elliots. There is rubbish dumped here daily.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London

item.title: Pavement in need of cleaning, 12th October
item.description:
The pavement has not been cleaned foe 4 months also the amherst wood have over grown the pavment i have reported this before but no action took place
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Amherst Drive, Poverest, London

item.title: A crashed car has been left there for over a week. It is at such an angle that cars are forced to overtake it as they approach the brow of the bridge going towards Bexley., 12th October
item.description:
It is particularly dangerous because other vehicles are forced to overtake it as they approach the brow of the bridge ongoing over the A2. It is at such an angle that you cannot see its rear reflectors at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Rochester Way, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bins, 12th October
item.description:
Litter bins were not emptied this week. They are now spilling over, leaving litter all over the street and pavement and encouraging fly tippers to leave their bin bags too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trenchard Street, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Dead fox, 12th October
item.description:
There is a dead fox in the bushes in between 2 and 2a Page Heath Lane. It is rotting and starting to smell.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Page Heath Lane, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Raised pavement for cycle lane caused injury due to lack of lighting, 12th October
item.description:
On Saturday 11th October at approximately 8.15pm, I crossed the road outside Pizza Express 194 Haverstock Hill and fell very badly onto the ground as I did not see the raised curb for the cycle lane. There is very poor lighting and I did not realise that there are raised pavements for the cycle lanes. I have suffered significant injuries including a bruised and potentially fractured wrist as it is painful to move and grazed and bruised knees and legs. Better lighting should be placed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 186, Haverstock Hill, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mountbatten Close, Plumstead, London

item.title: Litter on the roadside, 12th October
item.description:
There’s a lot of litter (including a mattress) scattered on the grass next to the road. It continues further along the road towards Stansted. It needs to be cleaned up, as it’s a major eyesore.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M11, Woodford Bridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The mayor of the London borough of Hackney talks about cleaner air, more cycle routes for residents general public. What is the mayor of Hackney doing about the clean air on drugs when people are smoking illegal drugs in the public park on Saturday., 12th October
item.description:
Cleaner rare more cycling more drugs in your local park.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): London Fields East Side, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public tree needs pruning, 12th October
item.description:
Tree positioned outside 48 Gundulph Road needs pruning. Both berries and leafs keep landing in my front garden. Meaning I have to frequently sweep my drive. I suffer from a bad back and this is beginning to cause me physical issues. Please can this tree be pruned and ideally repositioned to minimise the disruption on my drive?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gundulph Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
